name: Crossy Doggo.
description:
Hai, It's My first game. It's a Demo version it has no content honestly. But I create it because I join game development from Kemdikbud, it's called Kampus Merdeka.  I joint Skilvul to become Studen Independent and it is a game that I made of.

All of my asset it's relatively free.  I make 3d assets for games and for music it came from under the license : Music: Lazy Dally Comedy by https://www.redafs.com/, Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License" Promoted by Audio Library No Copyright Music free to use https://bit.ly/2ROKJUB

Sound Effect: for walking it's from One pice, walking character's name is a chopper, which I found on youtube. So crush sound effect from youtube it's called "Scary Sound Effect"

All my gratitude thanks to all my friend's alongside a game that I made, my mentor, and my teacher who give me amazing how to make games.
